Wellcome to Inner Light

Your cozy corner for reading, learning, and discovering stories

At Inner Light Small Library, we believe that every book opens a new world. Our collection includes fiction, non-fiction, history, and children's books. We also host weekly reading clubs and storytelling events for young readers.

Popular Book Categories

  • Adventure & Mystery
  • Science & Technology
  • History & Culture
  • Children's Books
  • Self-Development

Our library started as a small community project in 2023, built with love and passion for sharing knowledge. Today, it has grown into a cozy space where readers of all ages can find inspiration. We offer free membership for students and discounted access for senior citizens. Members can borrow up to five books at a time.

Visit us at blabla Street, Reading Town.

Open from Monday to Saturday, 9 AM - 6 PM.
